name: Helmarch
description: Helmarch is a computer game project currently in the prototyping phase that aims to be a retro FPS/RPG hybrid in the same vein as classics such as System Shock, Strife, and Ultima Underworld. Levels are planned to be streamlined into handcrafted maze-like areas that each possess their own unique theme and purpose in Helmarch's grim fiction. Players will progress with a skill system and develop their own weapon arsenal that allows them to interact with the world and progress further in the story through several facilities and spaces.
